internationalizations.description:
About Me

I'm Brian Keith Davis, a seasoned developer with a passion for creating impactful digital experiences. Here's a glimpse into my journey:

Early Beginnings

In 11th grade, I dipped my toes into programming with Turbo Pascal. Soon after, I delved into web development, mastering CSS, HTML, and JavaScript. These early experiences ignited my love for coding.

Evolving Skills

  • ASP Classic with Visual Basic Script: My gateway into server-side scripting.
  • ASP.NET MVC: A pivotal step toward building dynamic web applications.
  • .NET Core: Embracing modern frameworks and enhancing performance.
  • .NET 8: My current playground for innovation.

Military and Beyond

During my time in the Army, I served as a webmaster at the NSA, using Microsoft Front Page to maintain critical web assets.This experience sharpened my skills and instilled discipline.
